About us

We are a young and innovative technology startup in the field of digitalization based in Karlsruhe. Our vision is to make digitization cost-effective and with the least possible effort for every company

Digitization is a challenge for companies. We provide support during the entire digitization process. So companies can continue to focus on their core concept. Together with our IoT expertise and the branch-specific knowledge of the companies, we design and implement an individual digitization that is customized to the company's requirements
